generated_body: In the article titled "Trump urges Iran to release ex-FBI agent Levinson," the user may expect a discussion centered on former President Donald Trump's public statement regarding Robert Levinson, who has been missing in Iran since 2007. The piece is likely to explore the implications of Trump's remarks on U.S.-Iran relations, particularly in the context of ongoing diplomatic tensions. It could also provide insights into the background of Levinson's case and the broader impact of his disappearance on American foreign policy. The article may include reactions from political analysts or officials regarding the effectiveness of such calls in securing Levinson's release.
